cleaned_text: I am healthy pouch! Shapes, sizes, and colors may vary as they are natural stones. Cleansed, reiki charged and set with the intention of keeping your immune system boosted and staying healthy and stress free! Comes with a pouch so you can easily fit it in your pocket, purse, etc. To carry with you. The Stones included are all raw and unpolished. Personally for me I feel that the energy is stronger and more organic from raw and unpolished stones. Selenite Green aventurine Shungite Smokey quartz Amethyst Citrine Clear quartz point Shapes and sizes may vary, as they are Natural stones. Bag color may vary. *** In accordance with Etsy policy, this item is for entertainment purposes only. Seller makes no claims that this item has supernatural powers, it is a curio item only.
